name: Sprite stacking
description:
This project utilizes the sprite stacking technique in order to render *3D-like* entities with my 2D graphics library.

This technique consists of layering several sprites on top of each others, rotate each layer using the base layer as pivot, and counter rotate the entity back.

![Notes](/projects/_typescript_build_2/spritestacks.png)
instructions:
Move forward with <kbd>W</kbd>, backward with <kbd>S</kbd>

Circle your mouse around the player to turn the camera around.
